1107170.name: Champions
1107170.description: Champions is a Soulslike Rpg. You are a God's champion set on a adventure to protect the realms of Behward from the Evil God's champion. Go on comedic adventures, make new unique friends along the way, acquire new and unique classes change between anytime. Join multiple Guilds and raise through their ranks, and once your completed everything and wish to start over, enjoy playing through the story on new-game plus, for even greater challenges! Special new interactions! Weapons, armor, and redo choices you previously made in your last playthrough!
